name.en: Special topics on Teaching of Chinese Characters

notice.ch: 華語文教學學分學程選修課程。

remark.ch: 華語文教學學分學程選修課程。

goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應 1. 具備漢字演變與發展的本體知識；2. 了解漢字學習與認知歷程及漢字教學法等理論知識；3. 具備編寫漢字教材及設計漢字教學策略的能力；4. 具備數位科技輔助漢字教學的能力
goal.en:
Upon completion of this course, students should be able to:
possess ontological knowledge of the evolution and development of Chinese characters.
understand the theoretical knowledge of the learning and cognitive processes of Chinese characters, as well as teaching methods for Chinese characters.
possess the ability to design teaching materials and strategies for Chinese character instruction.
Possess the ability to utilize digital technology to assist in teaching Chinese characters.
